name: FileManager.ItemReplacementOptions
desc: Options for specifying the behavior of file replacement operations.

items.desc: Creates a value for a file replacement operation.

items.name: static var usingNewMetadataOnly: FileManager.ItemReplacementOptions
items.desc: Only metadata from the new item is used, and metadata from the original item isnâ€™t preserved (default).

items.name: static var withoutDeletingBackupItem: FileManager.ItemReplacementOptions
